basic_info.description: I'm William Cho. Experienced Data Collector with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in HTML, Data Analytics, Teamwork, Bootstrap, and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). Strong accounting professional with a Bachelor's degree focused in Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services from University of Washington. An innovative problem-solver passionate about developing apps, my current focus is on development and security. Since completing the bootcamp, I have continued my studies independently to learn more about server-back end functions and data storage.

projects.title: Puzzled
projects.description: A website designed for users to create, manage, and solve puzzles. Authentication that allows secure management and oversight of puzzles you upload or favorite from other users. This project was made through the culmination of all techniques that were practiced throughout the bootcamp. With a large focus on MERN stack, authorization, and a clean responsive UI. To visit the respository please click the link icon next to the project name or to view the deployed page copy this link [https://pazzazle.herokuapp.com/].

projects.title: DEVxp
projects.description: An interactive learning platform that provides a space for new and experienced coders to practice and develop coding skills. The website currently provides notecards and prompts the user with multiple choice questions related to the topic of their choosing. In future development the website will integrate a leveling system to track the user’s experience and reflect their knowledge. To view the repository please click the link icon next to the project name or to view the deloyed site copy this link [https://dev-xps.herokuapp.com/].

projects.title: Cookify
projects.description: A website designed with two API’s incorporated to fill the fundamental usage that if a user desires to use a specific recipe, they can use the site to find the ingredients in their local store under the Kroger umbrella. Please click the link icon next to the project name to see the repository and copy this link [https://jennyrae818.github.io/Cookify/] here for the deployed site.

experience.company: Domestic Violence Servies of Snohomish County
experience.title: Junior Business Consultant
